mapper.update: update credit_comment set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, daterecordid = #{daterecordid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, basiccomment = #{basiccomment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, extracomment = #{extracomment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, labelcomment = #{labelcomment,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
